body_html: CUDA architecture is something different than the driver and toolkit version (you can think of it as version of your hardware - it will be the same no matter what's the driver). 6.1 are the Pascal GPUs. You're all good.
body_text: CUDA architecture is something different than the driver and toolkit version (you can think of it as version of your hardware - it will be the same no matter what's the driver). 6.1 are the Pascal GPUs. You're all good.
body: CUDA architecture is something different than the driver and toolkit version (you can think of it as version of your hardware - it will be the same no matter what's the driver). 6.1 are the Pascal GPUs. You're all good.
